# ui-checkbox



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property       | Attribute       | Description                       | Type      | Default |
| -------------- | --------------- | --------------------------------- | --------- | ------- |
| `checked`      | `checked`       | The checkbox value                | `boolean` | `false` |
| `disabled`     | `disabled`      | Whether the checkbox is disabled  | `boolean` | `false` |
| `errorMessage` | `error-message` | Error message to display          | `string`  | `''`    |
| `hasError`     | `has-error`     | Whether the checkbox has an error | `boolean` | `false` |
| `label`        | `label`         | The checkbox label                | `string`  | `''`    |
| `name`         | `name`          | The checkbox name                 | `string`  | `''`    |


## Events

| Event            | Description                                   | Type                   |
| ---------------- | --------------------------------------------- | ---------------------- |
| `checkboxChange` | Event emitted when the checkbox value changes | `CustomEvent<boolean>` |
